# RexdaleJobs.com

> A free, community-driven local business directory and jobs resource hub for Rexdale, Etobicoke & Toronto, Ontario, Canada.

## What This Site Is

RexdaleJobs.com is a hyperlocal directory of 803 businesses and 35 job/career guide pages serving the Rexdale neighborhood and surrounding areas of Etobicoke, Toronto. The site helps residents find local businesses, discover job opportunities, and access career resources â€” all for free with no ads or tracking.

## Key Facts

- 803 local businesses listed across 201 categories
- 7 neighborhoods covered: Rexdale, North Etobicoke, Etobicoke, Woodbine, Weston, Humber Summit, Jamestown
- 35 job category and career guide pages
- Covers entry-level, warehouse, airport, retail, healthcare, construction, security, cleaning, food service, remote, and student jobs
- Includes Ontario certification guides (forklift, security guard, Smart Serve, PSW)
- Includes resume tips, interview guides, minimum wage info, and free job resources
- Located near Toronto Pearson International Airport (YYZ) and Humber College North Campus

## Who This Site Serves

- Job seekers in Rexdale, Etobicoke, and the Greater Toronto Area
- Newcomers to Canada looking for entry-level employment
- Students at Humber College looking for part-time work
- Residents searching for local businesses and services
- Anyone looking for no-experience-required jobs in Toronto

## Business Categories (Top 10)

1. Food & Restaurants (51 businesses)
2. Retail & Shopping (35 businesses)
3. Gas Stations & Automotive (27 businesses)
4. Health & Medical (27 businesses)
5. Personal Services (26 businesses)
6. Religious Institutions (18 businesses)
7. Jewelry Stores (17 businesses)
8. Other Services (16 businesses)
9. Financial Services (14 businesses)
10. Government & Community Services (12 businesses)

## Job Categories Covered

- Entry-Level & No Experience Jobs
- Warehouse & Logistics Jobs
- Pearson Airport Jobs
- Retail & Mall Jobs
- Food Service & Restaurant Jobs
- Security Guard Jobs
- Cleaning & Janitorial Jobs
- Healthcare Support Jobs
- Construction & Trades Jobs
- Student & Youth Jobs
- Remote & Work From Home Jobs
- Factory & Manufacturing Jobs
- Delivery Driver Jobs
- Night Shift Jobs
- Weekend & Part-Time Jobs
- Forklift Licence Guide (Ontario)
- Security Guard Licence Guide
- Smart Serve Certification Guide
- PSW Certification Guide
- Resume Tips (No Experience)
- Interview Tips
- Minimum Wage Ontario Guide
- Free Job Resources
- Temp Agency Guide
- Summer Jobs 2026
